alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; DeSoto; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 11:14PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Highlands, Charlotte, southeastern DeSoto and Lee Counties through MIDNIGHT EDT... At 1111 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong gusty winds ahead of a band of showers and thunderstorms extending from near Kissimmee Prarie Preserve to 8 miles east of Babcock Ranch to 16 miles west of Pineland. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Bonita Springs, Punta Gorda, Lake Placid, Lehigh Acres, Lake Istokpoga, Palmona Park, Southwest Florida Airport, Harlem Heights, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Babcock Webb Wma, Cypress Lake, McGregor, Babcock Ranch, Pine Manor, Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores, Olga, Venus, and Pineland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; DeSoto; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee
